title: Players going AFK because of bots should NOT be penalised.
body:
If a team goes AFK in ARAM because the rest of the team are bots and we want the game to finish quicker should NOT be penalised. 

ARAM is the only mode I play so why should I have to sit and play a game that cannot be won, easier to go AFK, make a coffee, read a book and although nearly impossible, find the next game that isn't infested with bots.

replies.body:
LMAO.
7k+ ARAMs played and you question my ability to ID a bot?

could you maybe write the details down for everyone to see so we can id the bots ? do they take the same runes?
items? do they run to enemys? what do they do?

Check their summoner spells, a lot of them seem to carry clarity and ignite on them lately no matter what champ they are playing. 

They will move erratically, your team might engage but they will sit back or they will rush the other team alone.

They will use their ults when no enemies are even close to them. They will also not be in a club (at least none that I have seen in every game)

They will not talk at all in game either (I know, some people don't) but most real players at least communicate.

The next thing I want to try is trading champs with them in the lobby to see what happens. I have a feeling the trade will just time out.
